verbs.description: [ARG0: Former White House Chief of Staff Karl Rove] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: disputed] [ARG2: a White House assertion that special counsel Robert Mueller has exceeded the original scope of the investigation into possible Trump campaign collusion with Russia] .

Former White House Chief of Staff Karl Rove on Monday disputed a White House assertion that special counsel Robert Mueller [V: has] exceeded the original scope of the investigation into possible Trump campaign collusion with Russia .

Former White House Chief of Staff Karl Rove on Monday disputed a White House assertion that [ARG0: special counsel Robert Mueller] has [V: exceeded] [ARG1: the original scope of the investigation into possible Trump campaign collusion with Russia] .
